name: Halloween Zombie Smasher
description:
Halloween Monster Smasher game is an entertaining game smash all stupid Halloween Those stupid Halloween are back Smash all halloween like a stupid zombie and smash all little zombies an Pumpkins very easy and addictive game of zombie or monster .it is a scary zombieville horror witch popping game of 2016
Game features :-

- 3 mode of game classic time and 2 player 
- 2 Different halloween and pumpkins are Attack
 - In classic are include 60 levels - In time to give some time limit to kill halloween 
- In 2 player game to play with your Friends
 - Share with all social Media and play.
